title: Jayce Hammer Form
body: Am i the only one that gets a slight lag everytime Jayce changes from his cannon to hammer??? I get this constantly in all the games with a Jayce on the other team, and i even get a sudden lag spike when i even play Jayce.

replies.body: It happens to me as well. Also a few NA players reported it a while ago. No fix yet.

My first guess would be to do with graphics. The change in graphics (Particle Density) when you swap between stances could be taking a toll on your card. Don't quote me on this though, I am no IT guru.. Just a logical common denominator.

Or, the other suggestion in this thread, could be game files..
try and repair your game files / defrag
